Name: Anas Bourak
BioText: Anas Bourak from Morocco is a young reciter of the Holy Qur'an. Born in Casablanca in 1992, he holds several prizes following various entries in national and international Koranic competitions. Imam during the holy month of Ramadan in Europe, he also represented Morocco in numerous demonstrations and won the title of Sharjah singer in the United Arab Emirates.
